name: Trianglovers
description:
Trianglovers is a matchmaking simulator where your task is to help 10 eligible Trianglovers find their true love.

Take turns asking each Lover a series of questions to help you complete their match chart, then pair them up based on your findings.

Try out hard mode - where your questions are limited and the Lovers have more similar shapes.

This game was submitted as a part of the Dogpit Sim Jam, and was created in 17 days. It uses the Ebiten engine for Go. The code is open sourced at https://github.com/mortenson/trianglovers

Enjoy!

Credits:

  • Sam Mortenson - Music, art, code
  • Mykal Mortenson - Original concept, QA
